resources.string: You need \'allow\' location in the settings of your app\n or reinstall the app.\nNow app can\'t work correctly
Compass can\'t work correctly.\nYour device haven\'t magnetic field sensor
Compass can\'t work correctly.\nYour device haven\'t accelerometer sensor
The application needs your location to calculate the distance and direction to the destination :)
Latitude and Longitude cannot be empty
